$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/wid.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/widget-giscus.js

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/mod.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/modules/utteranc/config
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/mod.caption: utteranc config
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/mod.text:
\whitespace trim \define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-utteranc/config
Github Repo Link: <$edit-text tiddler=<> placeholder="username/reponame" field="repo" tag="input" default="" /> <$button> Reset Config <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/>

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/utt.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/utteranc/widget.js

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/gis.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/giscus-config
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/gis.subtitle: {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon-gem}} Giscus Config {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-modal-ui/close-modal}}
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/gis.text:
\define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config \define tidFilter() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/filter You may have to save and reload the wiki to activate changes. * Install giscus for your github repo [[Install Giscus|https://github.com/apps/giscus/installations/new]] * [[get giscus parameter|https://giscus.app/zh-CN]] <$select field="style" tiddler=<> tooltip='badge style'> <>
Github Repo Link: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="repo" tag="input" placeholder="username/repo" default="" />
Github Reop Id: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="repoId" tag="input" placeholder="TSJHFJDKHJExxx" default="" />
Github Repo Category Id: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="categoryId" placeholder="DKSOFHGJVDKLXX" tag="input" default="" />
Giscus theme: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="gtheme" placeholder="light" tag="input" default="" />
filter: <$edit-text tiddler=<> placeholder="[!is[system]]" tag="input" default="" /> <$button> Reset filter <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>>/>

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/mac.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/macro/discussions
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/mac.text: \whitespace trim \define giscusDiscussions() <$set name="base-repo" value="https://github.com/"> <$set name="target" value="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config"> <$button class=<>> get[repo]addsuffix[/discussions]addprefix]}}} target="_blank"> üíé Discussions \end \define giscusBadge() <$set name="base-repo" value="https://github.com/"> <$set name="imgshield" value="https://img.shields.io/github/discussions/"> <$set name="target" value="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config"> <$button class=<>> get[repo]addsuffix[/discussions]addprefix]}}} target="_blank"> get[repo]addprefixaddsuffix[?style=]] [get[style]] +[join[]]}}} > \end

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/mac.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/macro/get-started
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/mac.text:
<!-- general -->
\define nbtn(started-tid, class:"get-started", caption:"Get Started")
  <$button class=$class$ tooltip="$caption$">
    $caption$
    <!-- list filter todo -->
    <$action-navigate $to={{{ $started-tid$ }}}/>
  </$button>
\end

\define nav-tid(tid)
<$button setTitle=<<tabsState>> setField="text" setTo=$tid$ class="os-started">
  GettingStarted
</$button>
\end

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/sty.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/style

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/clo.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/close-modal
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/clo.text: {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon-gem}} <$view tiddler="$:/temp/focussedTiddler" field="text" /> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="close">   <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<>/>

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/gis.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/giscus-modal
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/gis.subtitle: {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/close-modal}}
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/gis.text: <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-hitokoto]has[plugin-type]]"> <$ohitokoto /> <$giscus id={{$:/temp/focussedTiddler}} lang="en" theme={{{ [[$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config]get[gtheme]else[light]] }}}/>

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/ui/.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/ui/giscus-modal
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/ui/.caption: giscus on modal
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/ui/.text: \whitespace trim <$list filter="[[$:/temp/focussedTiddler]!is[missing]]"> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/focussedTiddler]get[text]!is[system]!has[draft.of]]"> <$button message="giscus" tooltip="comment" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/giscus-modal"/> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="giscus"/> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/focussedTiddler]!is[missing]]"> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/focussedTiddler]get[text]has[plugin-type]]"> <$button message="giscus" tooltip="comment" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/giscus-modal"/> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon}}

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/vie.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/viewtemplate
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/vie.text:
<$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]!is[draft]subfilter{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/filter}]" variable="comment">
<$list filter="[[$:/temp/focussedTiddler]is[missing]]">
        <$set name="stateTiddler" value="$:/state/oeyoews/github-giscus-comments">
          <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<stateTiddler>> text=<<currentTiddler>>>
              <$button class="tc-btn-invisible giscus-footer" set=<<stateTiddler>> setTo=<<currentTiddler>> >
                Show Comments
              </$button>
          </$reveal>
          <$reveal type="match" state=<<stateTiddler>> text=<<currentTiddler>>>
              <$button class="tc-btn-invisible giscus-footer" set=<<stateTiddler>> setTo="">
                  Fold Comments
              </$button>
              <!-- load giscus -->
              <$giscus id=<<comment>> lang="en" theme={{{ [[$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config]get[gtheme]else[light]] }}}/>
              <!-- back -->
              <$button class="tc-btn-invisible giscus-footer">
                  Back to top ‚Ü•Ô∏é
                <$action-navigate $to=<<currentTiddler>> >
              </$button>
          </$reveal>
        </$set>
</$list>
</$list>
